skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Redux Toolkit (RTK). Crafting dynamic, user-friendly web experiences with efficient state management.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Understanding of Node and Express JS with MVC pattern, integrating MongoDB for efficient data storage and retrieval in web applications.

skills.title: Programming Languages
skills.description: Familiarity with C,C++,Python, and Javascript. Currently Learning Data Structures and Algorithms with JS.

skills.title: Computer Engineering
skills.description: Licensed Computer Engineer with knowledge in various domain of computer engineering.

portfolio.title: E-Commerce Dashboard
portfolio.description: This is E-Commerce Dashboard where we perform CRUD operations on products with Add To Cart Functionality. Product identification and esewa payment gateway is also integrated. Overall, it is a complete E-Commerce Dashboard built using MERN Stack.

portfolio.title: Trivia Quiz App
portfolio.description: This is Trivia Quiz App where we can play quiz on different categories. It is built using React.js and Open Trivia DB API. It is a complete quiz app with different categories and difficulty levels.

portfolio.title: Multi Step Form
portfolio.description: This is Multi Step Form where we can fill the form in multiple steps. It is a multi-step form with validation where the admin can set up the Engineering subjects and the students can fill the form in multiple steps. It has simple UI with great understanding of data structure.
